mapper.select: select OW_STORE_INFO_PK from owner_store_info_tb where OW_STORE_BIZ_NUM = #{bizNum}
select ow_menu_info_detail_pk from owner_menu_info_detail_tb where ow_menu_id = #{menuId}

select ow_coupon_info_pk as owCouponInfoPk, ow_entire_fk as owEntireFk, ow_store_info_fk as owStoreInfoFk, ow_coupon_name as owCouponName, ow_coupon_count as owCouponCount, ow_coupon_start_date as owCouponStartDate, ow_coupon_expire_date as owCouponExpireDate, ow_coupon_detail as owCouponDetail from ( select owner_coupon_info_tb.*,row_number() over(order by OW_COUPON_INFO_PK desc) as num from owner_coupon_info_tb where OW_ENTIRE_FK=#{owEntirePk} and OW_STORE_INFO_FK=#{storeEntireFk}) where num between #{startPage} and #{endPage}
select count(*) from owner_coupon_info_tb where OW_ENTIRE_FK=#{owEntirePk} and OW_STORE_INFO_FK=#{storeEntireFk}

select ow_store_info_pk as owStoreInfoPk, ow_entire_fk as owEntireFk, ow_store_name as owStoreName, ow_store_tip as owStoreTip, ow_photo_route||'\'||ow_remake_name as owPhotoRoute, (select avg(OW_STORE_REVIEW_STAR) from member_store_review_tb where OW_ENTIRE_FK=ow_store_info_pk) as storeStarPoint from owner_store_info_tb, (select * from owner_store_detail_tb, owner_store_photo_tb where OW_STORE_PHOTO_PK = (select min(OW_STORE_PHOTO_PK) from owner_store_photo_tb where ow_store_info_fk = OW_STORE_INDEX and OW_PHOTO_TYPE_FK = 3)) where ow_store_info_pk = OW_STORE_INDEX and ow_entire_fk = #{owEntirePk}

select ow_store_info_pk as owStoreInfoPk, ow_entire_fk as owEntireFk, ow_store_name as owStoreName, ow_store_tip as owStoreTip, (select avg(OW_STORE_REVIEW_STAR) from member_store_review_tb where OW_ENTIRE_FK= #{storeIndex} ) as storeStarPoint, OW_STORE_INFO_PK as owStoreInfoPk, OW_ENTIRE_FK as owEntireFk, OW_STORE_TEL as owStoreTel, oi.OW_STORE_BIG_TYPE_FK as owBigTypeFk, oi.OW_STORE_DETAIL_TYPE_FK as owSmallTypeFk, OW_STORE_URL as owStoreUrl, OW_STORE_ADDR as owStoreAddr, OW_STORE_WORKING_TIME as owStoreWorkingTime, OW_STORE_DETAIL_PK as owStoreDetailPk, OW_STORE_COMMENT as owStoreLineComment, OW_RECOMMAND_MENU as recommandMenu, OW_STORE_TABLE_INFO as storeTableInfo, OW_BUDGET as budgetInfo, OW_SUB_INFO as owSubInfo, OW_DRINK_LIST_INFO as owDrinkListInfo from owner_store_info_tb oi, owner_store_detail_tb od where OW_STORE_INFO_PK = #{storeIndex} and OW_STORE_INDEX = #{storeIndex}
mapper.update: update owner_store_info_tb set OW_STORE_NAME = #{owStoreName}, OW_STORE_TEL = #{owStoreTel}, OW_STORE_BIG_TYPE_FK = #{owBigTypeFk}, OW_STORE_DETAIL_TYPE_FK = #{owSmallTypeFk}, OW_STORE_URL = #{owStoreUrl}, OW_STORE_ADDR = #{owStoreAddr}, OW_STORE_WORKING_TIME = #{owStoreWorkingTime} where OW_STORE_INFO_PK = #{owStoreInfoPk}

update owner_store_detail_tb set OW_STORE_BIG_TYPE_FK = #{owBigTypeFk}, OW_STORE_DETAIL_TYPE_FK = #{owSmallTypeFk}, OW_STORE_COMMENT = #{owStoreLineComment}, OW_STORE_TIP = #{owStoreTip}, OW_RECOMMAND_MENU = #{recommandMenu}, OW_STORE_TABLE_INFO = #{storeTableInfo}, OW_BUDGET = #{budgetInfo}, OW_SUB_INFO = #{owSubInfo}, OW_DRINK_LIST_INFO = #{owDrinkListInfo} where OW_STORE_INDEX = #{owStoreInfoPk}
mapper.select: select OW_STORE_DETAIL_PK as storeDetailInfoPK, OW_STORE_INDEX as storeIndex, OW_STORE_MENU_TYPE_FK as menuType, OW_STORE_MENU_INFO_DETAIL as menuInfoList from owner_store_detail_tb where OW_STORE_INDEX =#{storeInfoIndex}

select OW_MENU_INFO_DETAIL_PK as owMenuInfoPk, OW_MENU_ID as menuId, OW_MENU_TITLE as menuTitle, OW_MENU_SUB_TITLE as subTitle, OW_MENU_SUB_EXPLAIN as explain, OW_MENU_SUB_COST as menuCost from owner_menu_info_detail_tb where OW_STORE_INFO_FK = #{storeIndex}

select MB_BOOK_PK as bookNo, MB_ENTIRE_FK as memberEntireNo, STORE_ENTIRE_FK as storeEntireNo, MB_BOOK_DATE as bookDate, MB_BOOK_ORDER_COUNT as bookOrderCount, MB_BOOK_PARTY_COUNT as bookPartyCount, MB_BOOK_TYPE as bookType, MB_BOOK_OPTION as bookOption, MB_BOOK_STATE as bookState, MB_BOOK_DEPOSIT as bookDeposit, (select mb_name from member_entire_tb mn where mn.mb_entire_pk = mb.MB_ENTIRE_FK) as bookname, to_char(mb_book_date_time,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as bookDateAndTime2 from member_book_tb mb where STORE_ENTIRE_FK = #{storeIndex}
